name: Late Santa Claus
description:
Design：Peiyu Ling

Programming: Peiyu Ling

Art: Peiyu Ling

Music: 大圣诞歌曲_爱给网_aigei_com aigei.com/s?q=圣诞&type=music&detailTab=file

This game is created for Games Now! Finland and South Korea game jam.

Finland is the hometown of Santa Claus. In this game, players will play as the reindeer to help Santa Claus give presents to children in time. 

This game uses physics to create challenge which is inpired by Angry Bird. And accoding to the lecture, the third point of Korean Game tradition is storytelling and this game includes a small story even though the developing time is short.

WebGL version has been updated.
